proofread.name: Proofreading
proofread.prompt: Please proofread and give me the corrected text without extra explanations.

fact_check.name: Fact Checking
fact_check.prompt: Please fact check and correct the following text.

auto_complete.name: Auto Completion
auto_complete.prompt: Please auto complete the following text without further explanations. If there are preceding questions or task introductions, please preserve them.
